summary:
A small mod that adds the holy negociator sword from Hellgate to skyrim
there are both two handed and one handed versions.
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys i am back with some major update (V2)

so i have changed the textures, the meshes and te uvs it represents a lot of work so i hope you enjoy =)




The weapons act like ebony ones, same stats and craft but if you want to get it quickly just type in the console 'help Holynegociator 4' and the weap code for one handed version or
help Holypacificator 4 for the two handed version.

original concept comes from Hellgate developed by Flashing studio


I made the mehes by myself with the few references i found on the net

my other mods :

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23326/

my youtube channel :
http://www.youtube.com/user/leguitaristemasque

Your are free to comment and repport me bug or problems i'am still a beginner at 3D art =)
author: DantX
